text: Survivor is a 2015 British-American spy thriller film directed by James McTeigue and written by Philip Shelby. The film stars Milla Jovovich, Pierce Brosnan, Angela Bassett, Roger Rees, Antonia Thomas, James D'Arcy, Frances de la Tour, Genevieve O'Reilly, Dylan McDermott and Robert Forster.The film was released theatrically in the United Kingdom on June 5, 2015, and direct-to-video in the United States on June 23, 2015.
